# ic-layout-grid-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute             | Description                                                 | Type                   | Default |
| ------------------ | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ------- |
| `colSpan`          | `col-span`            | The number of columns the grid item should span.            | `number \| undefined`  | `1`     |
| `colStart`         | `col-start`           | The column the grid item should start at.                   | `number \| undefined`  | `1`     |
| `hideInMobileMode` | `hide-in-mobile-mode` | If `true`, the grid item will be hidden on smaller screens. | `boolean \| undefined` | `false` |
| `rowSpan`          | `row-span`            | The number of rows the grid item should span.               | `number \| undefined`  | `1`     |
| `rowStart`         | `row-start`           | The row the grid item should start at.                      | `number \| undefined`  | `1`     |


----------------------------------------------
